name: StarRaver
description:
Hang out with your friends and party in this sci-fi music experience! Visit the unique clubs defining Starcade Arcade and enjoy the casual multiplayer party games in each room.



Test your aim in a sci-fi western saloon with a game of Space Pong, enjoy classics like VR Tic-Tac Toe, vibe with all species of aliens in the notorious Club Jazz, party with DJ Inkers while you play with Space Slurpies. Finally, relax and enjoy the show as you attend the StarRaver Concert.


You are a VIP guest in the Starcade Arcade universe. Welcome to our multiversal club.
